name: Luma Photon - Text to Image
description: Photon is a powerful text-to-image model that creates high-quality 1080p images with strong prompt adherence and multi-image reference support.

image_reference.description: URL of a reference image to guide generation

image_reference_weight.description: Weight of the reference image. Larger values will make the reference image have a stronger influence on the generated image.

style_reference.description: URL of a style reference image

style_reference_weight.description: Weight of the style reference image

character_reference.description: URL of a character reference image

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated image

seed.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation
